getDataBaseSequencyTableName() - Static method in class peanuty.framework.base.Config
Get the name of sequency table which will generate the unique id key of each table
the table contains 2 columns - "name(varchar(100))" and "currval(int)"
Defined at <dbconfig default="true" dataSource="jdbc/exampleDS" type="oracle" encoding="gbk" sequencyTable="t_sequency" sequencyCacheSize="20"/> of "WEB-INF/xml/sql.xml"

getDebugMode() - Static method in class peanuty.framework.base.Config
Get Debug Mode
If debug mode is set to true, all configuration value (based on the xml files under the directory "WEB-INF/xml") changes
will become effective without rebooting application server, if the debug mode is false, the application will get a better performance.

Defined at <dbconfig default="true" dataSource="jdbc/exampleDS" type="oracle" encoding="gbk" sequencyTable="t_sequency" sequencyCacheSize="20"/> of "WEB-INF/xml/sql.xml"

getResultList(String) - Static method in class peanuty.framework.base.DBConnection
Return a query result by using Map
getResultList(String, int, int) - Static method in class peanuty.framework.base.DBConnection
Return a giving scope query result by using Map
for a example:
String s = "select * from example";
Map result = DBConnection.getResultList(s, 50,60);
will return the record result from row 50th to 60th
getResultListSql(String) - Static method in class peanuty.framework.base.DBConnection
 
getResultListXML(String) - Static method in class peanuty.framework.base.DBConnection
Return a query result by using XML
result looks like:
<Items>
     <Item>
         <row>0</row>
             <field0>value0</field0>
             <field1>value1</field1>
...
